dataset.title: An Outline of Higher-level Classification and Survey of Taxonomic Richness (Addenda 2013)

abstract.para: Full citations: Zhang Z.-Q., ed. (2013). Animal Biodiversity: An Outline of Higher-level Classification and Survey of Taxonomic Richness (Addenda 2013). Zootaxa 3703 (1): 1-82. and Zhang Z.-Q., ed. (2011). Animal biodiversity: An outline of higher-level classification and survey of taxonomic richness. Zootaxa 3148: 1-237.

gbif.citation: Zhang, Z. Q. (2013). An Outline of Higher-level Classification and Survey of Taxonomic Richness (Addenda 2013). In O. Bánki, Y. Roskov, M. Döring, G. Ower, L. Vandepitte, D. Hobern, D. Remsen, P. Schalk, R. E. DeWalt, M. Keping, J. Miller, T. Orrell, R. Aalbu, R. Adlard, E. M. Adriaenssens, C. Aedo, E. Aescht, N. Akkari, P. Alfenas-Zerbini, et al., Catalogue of Life Checklist (Version 2013). https://doi.org/10.48580/dfp3-3st
